# Oatmeal Porridge

## Ingredients

* 1 cup water
* 1 cup milk
* 1 cup water
* 1 tsp vanilla essence
* 1-2 tsp salt
* 1 Tb sugar

## Extras

* 1 Tb honey or strawberry jam
* 1 tsp cinnamon
* 1 Tb butter

## Method

1. Add ingriedients to microwave safe container
2. Leave overnight (optional)
3. Microwave for 5 mins, stir, then another 5 mins


## Notes

1 cup oats serves 2 people
